players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I will investigate Bob tonight. He mentioned something suspicious about himself, which could indicate he's hiding something."
You: "I saw Bob looking around the campsite last night. He seemed to be checking on something."
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Bob, he was acting suspiciously."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
